/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a red roof, standing out against the greenery. The image is captured in 360 degrees, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The red roof of the building adds a pop of color to the scene. Overall, the image captures the essence of a sunny day in Beijing, with its blend of urban and natural elements.
